name: Broccoli Cheese Soup
author: Karin  Christian
summary: This is a great, very flavorful soup. Good for serving at luncheons or special gatherings with a quiche. To make this soup a little fancier, add 1 cup sliced mushrooms and 1 cup white wine with the onions.
ingredients: 1 (1 pound) loaf processed cheese food, cubed
directions: In a stockpot, melt butter over medium heat
Cook onion in butter until softened
Stir in broccoli, and cover with chicken broth
Simmer until broccoli is tender, 10 to 15 minutes
Reduce heat, and stir in cheese cubes until melted
Mix in milk and garlic powder
In a small bowl, stir cornstarch into water until dissolved
Stir into soup; cook, stirring frequently, until thick
